availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Magoffin County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Married to Virginia Gardner. Father of Eugene B. Gardner and George Gardner. Merchant in Magoffin County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Magoffin County, p. 66.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Magoffin County, Precinct 1, p. 29.
Find A Grave, "Joseph Gardner (October 1, 1835-March 7, 1887)," Memorial #89596744, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/89596744 (accessed December 18, 2018).
